name: Dive (itch) (hpnrep6)
description:
Goal: Prevent the core from being destroyed, while also preventing yourself from being destroyed.

Controls:
Mouse cursor - Turning
Left mouse button - Shoot
[W], [S] - Override Pitching
[A], [D] - Override Rolling
[Q], [E] - Override Yawing
[Spacebar] - Move forward

Submission to Hack The North 2021.

GitHub: https://github.com/hpnrep6/HackTheNorth-Dive

Audio credits:
SFX:
Laser
Laser
Bang/Explosion Metallic

Background Music:
Specter by TheAsianOnes
